description: Active development stories for porting Worktree Wrangler from zsh to TypeScript

stories.title: Phase 1: Core Infrastructure Setup
stories.description: Set up TypeScript project structure with all necessary build tooling, type definitions, and base interfaces as outlined in TYPESCRIPT-PORT-DESIGN.md Phase 1
acceptanceCriteria: All type definitions from design doc implemented
Base interfaces and abstract classes created
Utility modules (exec, filesystem, validation) implemented with tests
